constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: WASTE Name: Chessington Industrial Area (Site Suitable for Waste)
NEIPOL Name: SB1  South of the Borough
NEIGH Name: South of the Borough
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

description: Details required by Condition 5 (Demolition management plan), Condition 9 (Refuse and Recycling storage), Condition 11 (Secure cycle parking) and Condition 24 (Ecology Management Plan) of planning permission 19/00991/FUL (Demolition of the existing building of storage and distribution (Class B8) and clearance of the site; and erection of new replacement building (Class B8), with associated vehicle parking, service yard, landscaping and ancillary works, with retention of existing access.)
decision_conditions: That the applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above are agreed and that the conditions, as noted above, are hereby fully discharged.

The assessment of this application is based on measurements taken from the submitted drawings / plans. If it transpires that the drawings / plans submitted are incorrect this would nullify the validity of this decision and you are advised to submit a fresh application with the correct information / drawings.

Please submit a copy of an Ordnance Survey based site location plan scaled 1:1250 with the application site outlined in red and adjoining land owned by applicant in blue, showing at least two road frontages and a North point.The submitted location plan does not the show the red outline in the proposed site
